snippet: Barry and Fran Weissler, Broadway producers, chose their high-floor apartment for its killer views.
abstract: Broadway producers Barry and Fran Weissler love their art filled condo on Central Park West with floor-to-ceiling windows that give them great views of the park and Hudson River.
lead_paragraph: Barry and Fran Weissler, Broadway producers, chose their high-floor apartment for its killer views.

headline.seo: Broadway’s Barry and Fran Weissler on Central Park West
headline.main: Where the View Gets a Standing Ovation
headline.print_headline: Where the View Gets a Standing Ovation
